alert.note: Alert for Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 4:01PM CDT until June 18 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 401 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hillsboro, or near Harperville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Forest around 450 PM CDT. Homewood around 500 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
